basics.name: Mikel-Jon (Mike) West
basics.label: Video Editor, Visual Designer, Developer, Writer, Director
basics.summary: Mike recently relocated to Portland, Oregon from Albuquerque, New Mexico, where he has earned a BFA in Media Arts from the University of New Mexico and received on the job training in Technical Film Crew working in various capacities on major motion pictures and independent film production. Before starting Mega Ultra Studios, he worked for Network Broadcast affiliates KOB-TV and KWBQ as a Master Control Operator and Promotions Editor. Mike combines a technical aptitude in hardware and software with creativity and art in storytelling, graphic design, and marketing. Mike has written, directed, and editing award-winning short and feature length films and creates music videos and promotional material for performing artists and small businesses.

work.summary: Mega Ultra Studios produces and distributes award-winning short and feature length films, music videos, and promotional packages for performing artists and small businesses.
highlights: Writer, Director, and Editor for award-winning short films and feature films.
Produces and distributes music videos and promotional videos for performing artists and small businesses.
Designs motion graphics, titles, banners, posters, disk inserts, and assets for social media and streaming services such as Amazon Prime Direct, Roku, and YouTube.

volunteer.summary: Global movement of free coding clubs for young people.

publications.name: Video compression for 3d media
publications.summary: Innovative middle-out compression algorithm that changes the way we store data.

references.name: Erlich Bachman
references.reference: It is my pleasure to recommend Richard, his performance working as a consultant for Main St. Company proved that he will be a valuable addition to any company.
